poliastro.math.ode¶

Description¶

This subpackage provides solvers for ordinary differential equations (ODEs). It is a wrapper around the scipy.integrate module.

Modules¶

  • integrate: Functions for numerical integration of ODEs.

  • ivp: Solvers for initial value problems.

Modules

integrate

ivp
